name: Crossy Gates-Rush Through Gate
description:
The ultimate reflex challenge! Swipe left and right to navigate through the gates.

How To Play:

ball is moving forward with snake like slithering trail and u have to move the ball left and right by dragging finger on the screen.

so pass through the gates and don't miss any gate or hit with any blocks.gates have big holes and gapes to pass through.

rush towards the win gate to clear the level

Game Features:

games Comes with colorful roads and gates to clear
Randomly generated levels so you will never run out of content

Your Goal:

Rush Through the gates!.Pass all the levels..Don't miss the gates.
